Package groupOfCards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupOfCards.Deck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pile

    public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a deck, the group of cards from where a player takes a card where he cannot plays one from his hand.
    Author:
    Benjamin Héroult

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final Deck getInstance​()
        static method called instead of the constructor, to assure that the class Deck is instantiated only once.
        Returns:
        the value of the variable that allow to keep in memory the number of class' instances

      • giveCardToPLayer

        public void giveCardToPLayer​(Player player)
        Gives a card from the deck to the player, when distributing or when a player has to pick one. Also control the fact that there is still at least 5 cards in the deck (takes some from the pile to
        Parameters:
        player - the player concerned

      • createCards

        public void createCards​(int nb_jeux)
        Creates the deck with all the cards.
        Parameters:
        nb_jeux - number of decks (1 or 2), so 52 or 104 cards
